pages.text: Also known as the "Witcher's Shield", the Witcher can press $(6)$(l)[$(k:loadToolbarActivator)]$() $(l)(Creative: Load Hotbar Activator)$() to cast Quen - a protective shield that will protect the Witcher from the next source of damage they take, or will dispell automatically after 20s. Quen has a cooldown of 35s after casting.

pages.title: Cooldown Bars
pages.text: $(l)TIP$(): Quen can be used to survive a creeper explosion, or an otherwise lethal fall!
